product_name: A4 80gsm White Copy Paper / Multi use Paper / White Plain A4 Paper
description:
This A4 80gsm copier paper is a reliable and versatile choice for all your daily printing and copying needs. Designed for smooth performance in a variety of printers, copiers, and fax machines, this paper delivers consistent, high-quality results. Its lightweight 80gsm makes it ideal for everyday office tasks, including reports, memos, and general correspondence.

Features:
Size: A4 (210mm x 297mm) – standard paper size for office and home use.
Weight: 80gsm – perfect balance between quality and affordability for everyday printing.
Compatibility: Suitable for inkjet and laser printers, as well as copiers and fax machines.
Finish: Smooth surface for crisp, clear text and images.
Eco-Friendly: Made from sustainably sourced materials.
Whether for personal, academic, or professional use, this A4 copier paper is a dependable choice for achieving polished results with ease.

latest_reviews.reviewBody: Congratulations ! Your packaging was outstanding. 4 layers of it : 3 wrappers : outermost; next; inmost, then two stout boards to protect the paper.
latest_reviews.author: Mike Maas
